wikipedia_page.main:
Neil McGarry (born 1983) is an Irish hurler who currently plays as a full-forward for the Antrim senior team.McGarry made his first appearance for the team during the 2008 National League and was a regular member of the starting fifteen for the following two seasons. During that time he won two Ulster medals.
At club level McGarry is an All-Ireland medalist with Loughgiel Shamrocks. He has also won two Ulster medals and two county club championship medals.
